> <OLD>
>
> "Where we going?"said Nightlight while she tried to freed herself, the
> guards have been caught her.

<NEW>

SABERBACK just watched as the SHARKTICONS began escorting NIGHTLIGHT
out of the room. "Now if I told you that it might ruin the surprise."

The SHARKTICONS were trying to 'escort' NIGHTLIGHT out of the room and
down the hall towards one of the lifts.

(TAG)

- Preston
